text: The 1878 Amherst football team was an American football team that represented Amherst College during the 1878 college football season. The team compiled a 1–3 record and was outscored by a total of six points to one. ==Schedule== ==References== Amherst Category:Amherst Mammoths football seasons Amherst Football
title: 1878 Amherst football team
